content:
Sure, here are a few other movies with similar themes to "Blast" that you might enjoy:

1. Black Hawk Down (2001) - This Ridley Scott film is based on the true story of a group of U.S. soldiers who become trapped in Mogadishu, Somalia, during a mission to capture a warlord.

2. Lone Survivor (2013) - Based on the true story of a Navy SEAL team sent to take out a Taliban leader in Afghanistan, this film is a gritty and intense depiction of modern warfare.

3. Zero Dark Thirty (2012) - This Kathryn Bigelow film follows the decade-long hunt for Osama bin Laden after the September 11 attacks, with a focus on the intelligence work and military operations that led to his eventual capture.

4. 13 Hours: The Secret Soldiers of Benghazi (2016) - Another movie based on a true story, this Michael Bay film tells the story of a group of CIA contractors who defend a U.S. diplomatic compound in Libya during a terrorist attack.

I hope you find these recommendations helpful!
